titleStmt.title: The theory of the earth containing an account of the original of the earth, and of all the general changes which it hath already undergone, or is to undergo till the consummation of all things.
titleStmt.author: Burnet, Thomas, 1635?-1715.

editionStmt.edition: The third edition review'd by the author.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.N. for Walter Kettilby,

notesStmt.note: Half title: The sacred theory of the earth.
In four books. Each has special t.p., except for the first. The third and fourth books have separate, continuous pagination.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.

Concerning the deluge, and the dissolution of the earth--Concerning the primaeval earth, and concerning paradise--Concerning the burning of the world, and concerning the new heavens and new earth--Concerning the new heavens and new earth, and concerning the consummation of all things--A review of the theory of the earth and its proofs.
